resources.string:
Hi, my name is Scott. 

I love exercise. 

The kind that is periodic, methodical, and results in explosive power. 
Fun fact is I still train at the age of 34 this day. 

I like testing myself in a battery of track tests with a fully automatic timing system. 
And sometimes I go to track meets. 
And even less sometimes, I go to the track because Manila is scarce of public facilities. 

I attained a Junior Olympic Gold medal and have earned a Division 1 scholarship in my past. 
I would be happy to teach you to maximize human performance.
